name: my-favorite-things
description: save in local machine favorite items, lists, comments, searches, categories, landings of a site. (using sc-types-frontend-extras jsxview and more to build a cool app to see what the code looks like using my favorite technologies)

scripts.build: cd .. && npx tsc && npm run sc-tsc && cd sca-module-unit-test && sh build.sh

author: sg
